WorkDemographic.name: WorkDemographic
WorkDemographic.description: Represents the field values used to specify slices in the workload forecasting and capacity planning.

CustomWorkType.description: Custom dimension value that the user can define other than the channel, region, and skill dimensions.

GroupIdentifier.description: The group or queue associated to a slice when creating an Omni-based workload.

JobProfileId.description: The foreign key to the JobProfile object.

ServiceChannelId.description: The foreign key to the ServiceChannel object.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The foreign key to the ServiceTerritory object.
